title: Drawing, "Textile Design: Diagonal Arrangment of Balls on Plaid Ground", 20th century
medium: Brush and gouache on white paper.
description: Red and white ball motif on wavy white and red diagonal lines to evoke a plaid effect, pink ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Textile Design: Diagonal Arrangment of Balls on Plaid Ground", 20th century.
20th century. Brush and gouache on white paper.. Gift of Max Wilner. 1942-87-4-b.
